"Danger in the Greenscape":
"The forest is full of way dangerous things. I wish I
could just kiss that place good-bye, but I got orders
to go survey its deepest depths. I barely made it
back in one piece. You see, when this crazy powerful
monster called a Rockbear attacked, I hightailed it
out of there. But when I filed my report, I was ordered
to go back and take it down! Those ARKS officers can
be real slave drivers sometimes. I mean, crazy scary
stuff like that should just be left alone! But if you
think you can handle it, please be my guest."

"森にはワケわかんねえのがウジャウジャ
いるから、マジ勘弁してほしいぜ……
最深部の調査を命令されて
一応、行ってきたワケよ。
ロックベアなんてとんでもない化け物が
出てきたから、即行で撤退して報告したら
今度は倒せって、アークスも人使い荒いよ。
あんなのほっときゃいいのにな。
オレとおたくじゃ考え方が違うだろうけど
倒せるってんなら倒してみてくれよ。"
